actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide for the mailing of correspondence to Members of the Congress free of postage.

summary.text: Authorizes the mailing of correspondence to Members of the Congress at their official business address by a resident of the State or district represented by the Member free of postage. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to transfer revenues to the Postal Service to cover the expenses incurred under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide for the mailing of correspondence to Members of the Congress free of postage.
